message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping most of the cash!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the majority of the cash!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still in control!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm still getting the better deal!
I'm getting closer to getting my fair share, don't you think?
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much!
I'm not backing down, I want a better deal!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet!
It's time to split it down the middle, Alice! No more games!
